chat.title: Messages
chat.welcomeDescription: Select a conversation to start messaging with your contacts and professional service providers.

finances.title: Finances
finances.budgetDescription: Set spending limits and track your financial goals
finances.noBudgetsDescription: Create your first budget to start tracking your spending

focus.title: Focus Mode
focus.description: Minimize distractions and maximize your productivity with our advanced focus tools.

features.timerDesc: Work in focused intervals with built-in breaks
features.ambientDesc: Choose from nature sounds to enhance concentration
features.trackingDesc: Monitor your focus patterns and productivity

theme.title: Adaptive Theme System
theme.description: Experience a dynamic interface that adapts to your mood, activity patterns, and time of day for optimal productivity and comfort.
theme.adaptiveModeDesc: Automatically adjust colors based on your mood and time of day
theme.moodDesc: Detected from your activity patterns and time of day
theme.manualAdjustmentDesc: Override automatic detection with manual settings
theme.presetsDesc: Override adaptive mode with predefined themes
theme.adaptiveTheme: Adaptive based on mood and time

features.moodDetectionDesc: Analyzes your activity patterns to determine energy, focus, stress, and creativity levels
features.timeAdaptationDesc: Automatically adjusts colors based on time of day for optimal visual comfort
features.smartColorsDesc: Dynamic color palettes that enhance productivity and reduce eye strain

landing.heroSubtitle: Complete offline task and financial management with local AI voice processing. No internet required, complete privacy guaranteed.
landing.createTaskExample: Create a task to review budget
landing.enterpriseGradeDesc: Enterprise-grade task and financial management with local AI processing
landing.localAIDesc: Speech-to-text and text-to-speech processing entirely offline. No data leaves your premises.
landing.voiceTaskDesc: Create, update, and manage tasks using natural voice commands with intelligent parsing.
landing.voiceFinancialDesc: Record expenses and income through voice with automatic categorization and receipt parsing.
landing.privacyDesc: All voice processing happens locally. Zero cloud dependencies, complete data sovereignty.
landing.realTimeProcessingDesc: Instant voice-to-text conversion and immediate AI responses for seamless interaction.
landing.completePrivacyDesc: All voice processing happens locally. Zero cloud dependencies, complete data sovereignty.
landing.multiTierDesc: Standard, Pro, and Admin user roles with progressive feature unlocking and onboarding.
landing.voiceTaskCreationDesc: Create, update, and manage tasks using natural voice commands with intelligent parsing.

welcome.title: Welcome to TaskFin!
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with all the powerful features available.

navigation.title: Navigation Menu
navigation.content: Use this sidebar to navigate between different sections of the application. Each section offers specialized tools for productivity and organization.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.content: Your central hub showing key metrics, recent activities, and quick access to important features.

tasks.title: Task Management
tasks.content: Create, organize, and track your tasks with powerful filtering and categorization options.

createTask.title: Create New Task
createTask.content: Click here to add new tasks. You can set priorities, due dates, and organize them into projects.

finances.title: Financial Management
finances.content: Track your income, expenses, and budgets with comprehensive financial planning tools.

voice.title: Voice Control
voice.content: Use voice commands to quickly create tasks, add expenses, or navigate the application hands-free.

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.content: Get intelligent insights, automated suggestions, and helpful assistance with your daily tasks.

profile.title: Profile Menu
profile.content: Access your account settings, preferences, and user profile information.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: Customize your experience with themes, language preferences, and application settings.

taskList.title: Your Tasks
taskList.content: View and manage all your tasks in this organized list. Click on any task to edit or mark as complete.

taskFilters.title: Filter Options
taskFilters.content: Use these filters to quickly find specific tasks by status, priority, or category.

taskCreate.title: Task Creation Form
taskCreate.content: Fill out this form to create detailed tasks with descriptions, priorities, and due dates.

financialOverview.title: Financial Overview
financialOverview.content: Get a snapshot of your financial health with income, expenses, and budget summaries.

addRecord.title: Add Financial Record
addRecord.content: Click here to quickly add income or expense records to track your finances.

budgetPlanner.title: Budget Planning
budgetPlanner.content: Set up budgets and track your spending against your financial goals.

voiceRecorder.title: Voice Recording
voiceRecorder.content: Press and hold to record voice commands or notes that will be processed automatically.

voiceCommands.title: Available Commands
voiceCommands.content: View all available voice commands and their functions for quick reference.

voiceShortcuts.title: Voice Shortcuts
voiceShortcuts.content: Quick access buttons for common voice commands and actions.

onboarding.clickInstruction: Try clicking on this element to see how it works.
onboarding.hoverInstruction: Hover over this element to explore its functionality.
